What is Bob?
How to sign up?
Meet your people
Brunch photos
Find your
Social Circle

Whether you’re the worst bowler ever or you live on the lanes, BOB’s coed social leagues are setup to make meeting new people and having a blast as easy as possible. With 6 weeks of casual bowling, you get to hang with your team, play trivia for prizes, and then head to the after-bowling bar to play some bar/board games and kick it with the rest of the league!

Whether you’re the worst bowler ever or you live on the lanes, BOB’s coed social leagues are setup to make meeting new people and having a blast as easy as possible. With 6 weeks of casual bowling, you get to hang with your team, play trivia for prizes, and then head to the after-bowling bar to play some bar/board games and kick it with the rest of the league!
